description: This file is a JavaScript module implementing a minimal client for the Audius REST API. It provides functions to fetch trending tracks, search for tracks, retrieve track details by ID, and generate stream URLs, along with utility functions for data handling and artwork URL creation.

methods.name: getApiBase()
methods.description: Returns the base URL for the Audius API, configurable through environment variables.

methods.name: fetchJson(url, { signal } = {})
methods.description: Performs a fetch request to the specified URL and returns the parsed JSON, throwing an error if the request fails.

methods.name: unwrapData(payload)
methods.description: Normalizes API responses by extracting the 'data' field if present.

methods.name: getArtworkUrl(artwork, size = "480x480")
methods.description: Creates a URL for artwork images of various sizes from an artwork object.

methods.name: getTrendingTracks({ limit = 24, offset = 0, time = "week", signal } = {})
methods.description: Fetches trending tracks from the Audius API with optional parameters for limit, offset, and time period.

methods.name: searchTracks({ query, limit = 20, offset = 0, signal } = {})
methods.description: Searches for tracks based on a query string with optional limit and offset.

methods.name: getTrackById({ trackId, signal } = {})
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific track using its ID.

methods.name: getTrackStreamUrl(trackId)
methods.description: Constructs the stream URL for a track, which redirects to the actual media content.

ctags.name: getTrendingTracks
ctags.pattern: /^export async function getTrendingTracks({ limit = 24, offset = 0, time = "week", signal } = {}) /

ctags.name: searchTracks
ctags.pattern: /^export async function searchTracks({ query, limit = 20, offset = 0, signal } = {}) {$/
